insert into tb_user set
open_id = #{openId},
nickname = #{nickname},
photo = #{photo},
name = #{name},
sex = #{sex},
tel = #{tel},
email = #{email},
hiredate = #{hiredate},
role = #{role}, root = #{root},
dept_id = ( select id from tb_dept where dept_name = #{deptName} ),
status = #{status}, create_time = #{createTime}
mapper.select: select id from tb_user where open_id = #{openId} and status = 1

SELECT p.permission_name from tb_user u join tb_role r on json_contains(u.role,cast(r.id as char)) join tb_permission p on json_contains(r.permissions,cast(p.id as char)) where u.id = #{userId} and u.status = 1;
